text: Yak kur'yer do Ditey Izrayilya: "YA prybuvayu do vas z znakom z vashoho Lorda - ya stvoryuyu dlya vas z hlyny forma ptakha, todi ya duyu u tse, ta tse staye zhyvym ptakhom BOZHYM vid'yizdom. YA restavruyu zir do zavisky, hoyusya leprous, ta ya ozhyvayu mertvyy BOZHYM vid'yizdom. YA mozhu kazaty vam shcho vy hostytesya, ta shcho vy zberihayete u vashykh domivkakh. Tse povynno buty dokaz dlya vas, yakshcho vy viruyuchi
